vecUnachieved.strDescription: Set a price for the product
You can open or close the store by clicking the Open/Closed Sign at the entrance.
Complete a day in your store

data.strFullDescription:
[url=https://discord.gg/uq3W2wGDxq][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3089150/extras/RCS-Discord.jpg?t=1727342465[/img][/url]

[Retail Company Simulator: Prologue is a free prologue version of Retail Company Simulator. In this game, you'll have a limited amount of contracts.]

This is a first-person simulation game where you run a retail company.
Expand your humble store into a huge retail company.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3089150/extras/Store01_3.gif?t=1727342465[/img]

[h2]Store Workflow[/h2]
Sign contracts with leading brands, order new products with an in-game computer, unpack the boxes, place the products into your store, and set the prices for your products.
Consider the market prices while setting up your product prices in the store for customer satisfaction.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3089150/extras/Contract01.gif?t=1727342465[/img]

[h2]Products[/h2]
Please make sure your customers find all their needs in the store.
Always expand your product portfolio and satisfy your customers.
Shirts, jackets, pants, sweatshirts, dresses, t-shirts, shoes, hats, and more...
Be aware of the market prices and purchase more products when they're cheap.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3089150/extras/ShelfFill03_1.gif?t=1727342465[/img]

[h2]Customers[/h2]
Place a sufficient number of checkouts and fitting rooms to reduce the waiting time for customers.
Scan products and collect payments whether in cash or with card purchases.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3089150/extras/Checkout01_1.gif?t=1727342465[/img]

[h2]Expansions and New Teammates[/h2]
Expand your store and warehouse by leveling up your store and budget.
Hire stockers to fill the racks.
Purchase more cash registers and hire new cashiers to minimize long queues at the checkouts and to reduce waiting time for customers.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3089150/extras/Cashier01.gif?t=1727342465[/img]
data.strSnippet: Run your retail company in this free prologue version of the game. Sign contracts with leading brands, order new products, meet customer needs, and never let your customers leave the store empty-handed. Hire new workers, expand your store, and enjoy the growth of your retail company.
